scanOnly.comment: Send only basic information about files instead of full analytics. Only works when 'sendModList' is set to true

sendCrashes.comment: If false, skips sending pending crash reports. Please note that pending crashe reports will not be automatically removed.

sendModList.comment: If false, skips sending any mod list - ether basic file information or analytics. OpenEye will respond with information about files unknown to server

sentCrashReportsLimitTotal.comment: Maximum number of crash reports to sent (including pending) per single run

storeCrashReportsLimit.comment: Maximum number of crash reports from single category stored per single run

isExtraLinePosAbsolute.comment: If false, X and Y coordinates of notification line will be measured from screen width/2 and height/4 (standard MC algorithm)

isNotesButtonPosAbsolute.comment: If false, X and Y coordinates of notes button will be measured from screen width/2 and height/4 (standard MC algorithm)

mainScreenExtraLine.comment: Enables extra line in main menu screen under buttons (if true, only note button will be displayed)

mainScreenNotes.comment: Enables OpenEye additions to main menu screen
